name: The Factory Guard
description:
The Factory Guard game:

Important notes:

1-in the first level you will attack the enemies, take the kies and go to the end portal

2- in the second level you will fight the boss, and many other solders, it is a hard level, but we depent on you!

3- third level is "dark" level (no enemies), you have a lamp that's included with your weapon, take the key and open a big door to find the end portal and win the game!

The three significant modificationsI made:

1-new them ( or song) 

2-new enviroment in the third level

3-adding lamp with the weapon in the final level

Credit by: Elyas Abdulhamid Almousa
